## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b17e7bdb26521a7b7e638054ce600a2db0fba3fe05b08edc51b7236581947c1a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@native-rabobank/native-qr-scanner' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
